div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 256 Delos, 1931 (319) Burial: c. 150 B.C. (T); c. 120 (Lewis) Contents: 20 AR. From excavations Athens: 18 New Style tetradr. 2 New Style dr. Disposition: Myconos? Kambanis, BCH 1934, p. 122, note Thompson, Athens, p. 519 (among Kambanis' notes is the statement that the latest issue is of Euryklei- Ariara and that he saw the hd. in the Myconos museum)
